about.title: About Us
about.text_part1: Our company is a leading legal and accounting firm specializing in a wide range of specialized legal and accounting services, as well as providing comprehensive solutions for foreign clients. We offer highly qualified legal and accounting support in various fields of law, including corporate law, civil law, tax law, labor law, intellectual property law, administrative law, and others.
about.text_part2: Our team consists of experienced lawyers and accountants with deep knowledge and practical experience, which allows us to effectively solve the most complex legal issues.

services.subtitle: We handle cases of any complexity for individuals and legal entities

document-expertise.title: Document Development & Expertise
document-expertise.text: Professional drafting of contracts and legal analysis of documents.
document-expertise.fullContent: We ensure full legal literacy of your workflow, including international contracts and internal local acts.

licensing.title: Licensing
licensing.text: Assistance in obtaining government licenses for various business activities.
licensing.fullContent: Support for the licensing process from document collection to obtaining ready permits from state authorities.

company-registration.title: Company Registration
company-registration.text: Full support for business setup: from choosing a form to tax registration.
company-registration.fullContent: Registration of LLCs, Individual Entrepreneurs, and foreign branches with a full package of constituent documents.

debt-collection.text: Effective methods for recovering accounts receivable through court and negotiation.
debt-collection.fullContent: Professional representation in courts and enforcement proceedings for the actual recovery of funds.

trade-licensing.fullContent: Legal assistance in obtaining permits for the trade of alcohol, tobacco, and other excise products.

business-consulting.text: Prompt legal support on all matters of corporate and civil law.
business-consulting.fullContent: Analysis of business processes for compliance with legislation and resolution of current legal disputes.

creditor-protection.title: Protection from Creditors
creditor-protection.text: Legal mechanisms to protect company assets and restructure debts.
creditor-protection.fullContent: Development of an asset protection strategy and representation in negotiations with banks and creditors.

hr-management.title: HR Records Management
hr-management.text: Audit and setup of HR records in accordance with labor law.
hr-management.fullContent: Development of labor contracts, job descriptions, and protection of employer interests in labor disputes.

subscription-legal-service.title: Subscription Legal Services
subscription-legal-service.text: Your personal outsourced legal department for daily tasks.
subscription-legal-service.fullContent: Comprehensive business support at a fixed cost, replacing an in-house lawyer.

medical-licensing.title: Medical Licensing
medical-licensing.text: Obtaining licenses for clinics, pharmacies, and medical centers.
medical-licensing.fullContent: Checking premises and equipment for compliance with sanitary and health ministry standards.

it-legal-services.title: Legal Services for IT
it-legal-services.text: Legal support for software development and code protection.
it-legal-services.fullContent: Drafting of offers, license agreements, and legal support for entry into international markets.

data-protection.title: Data Protection
data-protection.text: Ensuring company operations comply with data protection laws.
data-protection.fullContent: Development of privacy policies, data processing regulations, and prevention of information leaks.

liquidation-procedure.title: Liquidation Procedure
liquidation-procedure.text: Safe termination of company activities without risks for owners.
liquidation-procedure.fullContent: Full cycle of closing a legal entity: from notifying authorities to destroying the seal.

certification.title: Certification
certification.text: Assistance in certifying goods to confirm quality and standards.
certification.fullContent: Obtaining certificates of conformity, declarations, and refusal letters for free circulation of goods.

patent-services.text: Registration of trademarks and protection of intellectual property rights.
patent-services.fullContent: Checking brand uniqueness and full support for patent registration in patent offices.

newspaper.title: WizzAir to Provide Uzbek Language Services on Flights to Uzbekistan
newspaper.desc_lead: WizzAir will ensure services in the Uzbek language on its flights to Uzbekistan. This was announced by the Committee for the Promotion of Competition and Protection of Consumer Rights.
newspaper.p1: According to the Committee, a request from former deputy Rasul Kusherbayev regarding issues encountered with WizzAir's services on the 'Samarkand-Abu Dhabi' route was reviewed.
newspaper.p2: The Committee's investigation revealed that during the flight, crew members provided safety instructions in a foreign language. When asked to explain the rules in Uzbek or Russian, a staff member reportedly behaved rudely, and the passenger was asked to leave the aircraft, though eventually reached Abu Dhabi on the same flight.
newspaper.p3: The Committee sent an inquiry to the Ministry of Transport regarding the investigation. As a result, appropriate measures were taken against the airline employees who engaged in arbitrary actions, according to the report.

news-1.title: WizzAir to Provide Uzbek Language Services on Flights to Uzbekistan
news-1.desc_lead: WizzAir airline has introduced Uzbek language services for passengers in Uzbekistan.
news-1.p1: According to the Committee, safety instructions will now be explained in Uzbek on all flights.
news-1.p2: This decision was made after numerous complaints and suggestions from passengers.
news-1.p3: Earlier, there were reports of misunderstandings with crew members regarding the language.
